personal.name: John Anderson
personal.title: Senior Mobile Developer
personal.tagline: Crafting exceptional mobile experiences with 5+ years of expertise in iOS, Android, and Flutter development. Passionate about creating intuitive, performant apps that users love.

about.description: I'm a passionate mobile developer with over 5 years of experience building high-quality applications for iOS and Android platforms. My journey began with native iOS development using Swift, expanded to Android with Kotlin, and now includes cross-platform solutions with Flutter. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating user experiences that delight. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or mentoring junior developers.
highlights: Specialized in native iOS and Android development
Expert in cross-platform solutions with Flutter
Strong focus on performance optimization and user experience
Published 15+ apps with over 1M+ combined downloads
